mobileAppsData.description: Lots of sports apps can give you the score, but how many can tell you which game you should be watching? Find out the no-hitters, double overtime thrillers, and other games worthy of watching.
mobileAppsData.title: Are You Watching This?!

mobileAppsData.description: This GPS distance finder and multiplayer scoring app gives you access to data for more than 8000 golf courses. Includes distances for greens, tee boxes, and more. Paid app; demo version also available.
mobileAppsData.title: GolfPinFinder

mobileAppsData.description: Stay on top of your golf game with the help of Golf Caddie. Track your scores and statistics, or get suggestions for which clubs to use.
mobileAppsData.title: Golf Caddie

mobileAppsData.description: Stay up to date on the latest scores around the league. Ticker and score alerts help you keep tabs on your favorite teams and your fantasy team, too.
mobileAppsData.title: Baseball Live!

mobileAppsData.description: Always know what's going on with your favorite college football and basketball teams with scores, schedules, news, live game results, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: College Superfans 2009-10 Season Pass

mobileAppsData.description: Easily keep tabs on the latest hockey scores. The app displays scores and schedules for NHL games, and you can set it to automatically refresh at a regular interval.
mobileAppsData.title: NHL Scores

mobileAppsData.description: Get scores and schedules for NBA games. Check the current day's scores or tap on a game summary to see a quarter-by-quarter breakdown and scoring leaders.
mobileAppsData.title: NBA Scores

mobileAppsData.description: Can't get to your TV to catch live, heart-pounding NFL action? No worries—with NFL SuperFan DIRECTV, you get live streams of every NFL SUNDAY TICKET<sup>™</sup> game right on your phone. <sup>2</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: NFL SuperFan

mobileAppsData.description: Keep track of your favorite teams and get updated fantasy info so you know who to start, sit, drop, or pick up. And receive score-change notifications, exclusive to Palm webOS.
mobileAppsData.title: Sporting News Pro Baseball

mobileAppsData.description: Get access to up-to-the-minute scores, schedules, news, and live game results for your favorite college football and basketball teams.
mobileAppsData.title: College Superfans

mobileAppsData.description: Never miss a game with this quick and easy way to find out when your favorite sports team is playing. Once you find the schedule, you can add it to the calendar on your webOS phone.
mobileAppsData.title: Sports Calendar

mobileAppsData.description: There's an app for every team, so you can always know what's going on with your favorite NBA team. Get the latest news and standings, and chat with other fans using the built-in chat feature.
mobileAppsData.title: Basketball Fan

mobileAppsData.description: Bring the world of Formula 1 racing to your webOS phone. Get the latest news along with the most up-to-date point standings and the full F1 schedule.
mobileAppsData.title: Elite GP

footnotes.text: 2  Live streams of every NFL SUNDAY TICKET GAME and the Red Zone Channel. (Requires NFL SuperFan subscription.)
